ygData.subject: Which web crawler pre select links before downloading and convert into mht file?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello all, I am new on this group. I am looking for a web crawler which can get list of links of a webpage and convert a website downloaded in mht file. It

Hello all,

I am new on this group. I am looking for a web crawler which ca=
n get list of links of a webpage and convert a website downloaded in mht fi=
le. It should also embed pdf,word,etc in one mht file.

I am currently usin=
g httrack in order to download a website and convert it into one single mht=
 file. It is a good tool but with some limitations :

_I want to get the li=
st of all links of a web page with an API.

_I want to embed pdf,word,etc .=
.. documents into the MHt file. Its not the case with httrack at the moment=
.

_I want to be able to download more websites without restrictions. For e=
xample httrack can't downloaded form based website such as www.lloyds.com.
=

Thanks,
